medium.description: Body text should never be smaller than 16px

breakpoint_sm.description: 18px (Ingress should never be smaller than 18px, to keep a visual difference from the body text that is 16px.)

xs.description: Specific styling for the smallest mobile sizes and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.

sm.description: Specific styling for the largest mobile sizes and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.

md.description: Specific styling for tablet and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.

lg.description: Specific styling for the largest tablets and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.Will affect screen sizes with this size and larger

xl.description: Specific styling for laptops and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.

xxl.description: Specific styling for desktops and up. Will affect screen sizes with the set size and larger.
